articles.title: Toyota meeting mayor after it threatens to leave Durban - MyBroadband
articles.description: eThekwini mayor Mxolisi Kaunda will be meeting Toyota to provide assurances after the company said it is uncertain if it can continue to invest in South Africa following recent riots that caused its Durban factory to grind to a halt.
articles.content:
The mayor of eThekwini Municipality, Mxolisi Kaunda, will be visiting Toyota tomorrow morning, 21 July 2021, his spokesperson has told MyBroadband.

articles.description: Dr Emmanuel Taban urges South Africans not to be misled by social media in regard to the use of Ivermectin for COVID-19.
articles.content:
